Articles.Content:
when i press space bar rockets or planes dont stage i have hyper-edit and breaking ground expansion

and my keyboard work well but spacebar dont activate anything . sorry for bad english.:(

Edited October 21, 2019 by accueil750

Is this all craft or just one craft?

If it's just one, either it could not have any control (no crew or probe core or dead batteries) or you could have locked staging (alt+L default)

If it's all, my best guess is make sure you didn't accidentally change the key bindings
